column2: Grapple foe's weapon arm and jerk his weapon free. Foe goes twisting and spinning out of your grasp.
column4: Hammer foe in his kidneys. You know he is in pain. He grips his side and falls down. Finish him, the pain will not last.
column6: Nasty strike to foe's mouth knocks out 2 teeth and reduces foe's appearance, by 5, when he smiles
column8: Drive your finger into foe's eye, causing blindness. There is a 10% chance that affliction in permanent.
column10: Face strike is so hard foe's cheekbone is shattered. The shards mortally wound foe. He dies after 10 rounds of agony.

column10: Throw foe into a solid object. He falls down.

column2: Precision strike to foe's arm disarms him. Weapon hand is fractured. Foe is in pain.
column4: Hand strike jams foe's finger into their sockets. Ouch! Foe drops everything in his hands.
column6: Strong blow to foe's arm fractures shoulder. You hit his shoulder one more time to make your point.
column8: Grab foe's weapon arm and pull him over. Your kick to the ribs finally drops him to the ground.
column10: Shoulder strike breaks foe's collar bone. Miscellaneous internal organ damage.

column2: Two brutal punches to foe's face. This barrage leaves foe confused and swinging in the wrong direction.
column4: Grab foe's weapon arm and beat on it without concern for the rest of foe. Foe is disarmed as ligaments are torn and muscles are pulled.
column6: Accurate chest strike knocks wind out of foe. He falls over on you and you knock him off with a upper cut. He stand back up and stumbles 5 feet.
column8: Blow to front of foe's neck. His head snaps back, but it does not break his neck. Foe cannot speak for 2-20 hours. He yells in silence.
column10: Nasty blow ruptures stomach. Foe is knocked down. Internal bleeding is mortal. Foe will die in 20 rounds. He is still active.

column2: Head strike breaks foe's nose. Appearance drops by 5 due to black eyes.
column4: Land a solid shot to foe's head. Foe is definitely impressed. He steps towards you to keep from falling.
column6: Precision strike to foe's head sends him to the ground. You can actually see the stars spinning around his head.
column8: Strong blow to face cracks jawbone. Ow! Jaw is stuck open and foe appears permanently surprised about something.
column10: Blow to foe's side. Bruise ribs, a kidney and a lung. Foe manages to remain standing. Oh that hurts ya know!

column2: Blow to solar plexus causes foe to vomit. He falls to his knees. Foe is unable to do anything but retch. Do you have pity?
column4: Groin strike is solid. You kick him again. Your strike leaves foe helpless. Really unkind.
column6: Strike foe in head. If he has helm, you pull it off and hit him with it. He is knocked out for 4 hours. If foe has no helm, you knock him out for 5 rounds.
column8: Strong blow to the abdomen causes internal bleeding and organ damage. Foe makes it a habit of spitting blood.
column10: Grip foe's neck. You shake him violently, while attempting to choke him. He passes out. You can finish him if you want.

column2: Elbow foe's face and then punch him hard. He is paralyzed from the neck down for 2 days. He falls instantly to the ground.
column4: Strike to foe's head. If he has no helm, he is in a coma for 10-100 days. If foe has a helm it leaves a bruise on his head. Foe drops and is unconscious.
column6: Mighty strike crashes into foe's head. If he has a helmet, he is unconscious for 1-10 days. If he has no helmet, skull collapses and brain is dead.
column8: Grip foe's arm and pound on foe's head. One shot hits head. Crushing strike to foe's temple. Foe dies instantly.
column10: Your strike is frightening. Foe's head snap to one side. Foe cannot breathe. He looks upon the world one last time and then dies. You are horrified at his doom.
